myDashboard.description:
If you would like to change your current password.


Login in your dashboard.


1. Open your Hindsite dashboard console. (https://app.hindsiteind.com/).

2. Login with your Email and Password.

3. Select the organisational unit to which you want to enter. (if you belong to more than one organization).

4. Go to the top right of your Navigation bar and click in the User icon.

5. Click in 'User Profile'.

6. Insert your Current password, New password and Confirm new password in the fields provided.

7. Click in 'Save' to save the new password.

8. Click in 'Cancel' to not change your current password.

If you would like to Generate QR Code.


Login in your dashboard.


1. Open your Hindsite dashboard console. (https://app.hindsiteind.com/).

2. Login with your Email and Password.

3. Select the organisational unit to which you want to enter. (if you belong to more than one organization).

4. Go to the top right of your Navigation bar and click in the User icon.

5. Click in Generate QR Code.

6. Click in Wifi Login.

- Insert SSID = Name of WiFi / phone/ device and Wi-Fi Password in the fields provided.

7. Click in Mobile Login to save the new password.

- Insert your Username and Password in the fields provided.

8. Click in Generate QR Code

Login in your dashboard.


1. Open your Hindsite dashboard console. (https://app.hindsiteind.com/).

2. Login with your Email and Password.

3. Select the organisational unit to which you want to enter. (if you belong to more than one organization).

4. Go to the top right of your Navigation bar and click in the User icon.

5. Click in Switch Organisation.

6. Select the organisation you want to enter.

Login in your dashboard.


1. Open your Hindsite dashboard console. (https://app.hindsiteind.com/).

2. Login with your Email and Password.

3. Select the organisational unit to which you want to enter. (if you belong to more than one organization).

4. Go to the top right of your Navigation bar and click in the Phone icon.

5. Online Users will show first in your list.

6. Click in the phone icon on the right of the user you would like to call.

7. Click in the X icon to finish the call.

Login in your dashboard.


1. Open your Hindsite dashboard console. (https://app.hindsiteind.com/).

2. Login with your Email and Password.

3. Select the organisational unit to which you want to enter. (if you belong to more than one organization).

4. Go to the top right of your Navigation bar and click in the Phone icon.

5. Online Users will show first in your list.

6. Click in the New group call.

- Select the user you would like to include in the group call.
- Click in the phone icon to call.

7. Click in the X icon to finish the call.

Before you begin


To create a user account, you need only the person’s valid email, first name and last name.
The system automatically generate a temporary password


Add a user


1. Open your Hindsite Admin console. (https://admin.hindsiteind.com/).

2. Select the organizational unit to which you want to add the user. (if you belong to more than one organization).

3. Go to Users (https://admin.hindsiteind.com/dashboard/users).

4. At the top of the page, click Add new user.

5. Add account information:
- First and last name
- Primary email address (Email have to be valid, a confirmation email will be sent with the temporary password).

6. Click 'Create'. Note: If the new account's primary email address matches an existing Hindsite Account, the user will only be added to the organisation, the data provided will not overwrite the existing data.



After you add the user


When you’re done, the new user can sign in. The new user receives a welcome email message that explains how to sign in for the first time.

Before people on your team can sign in and use your organization's Hindsite services, they need a user account. If you have many users, you can add their accounts all at once from a spreadsheet.


Step 1: Download the template file


1. Open your Hindsite Admin console. (https://admin.hindsiteind.com/).

2. Select the organizational unit to which you want to add the user. (if you belong to more than one organization).

3. Go to Users.

4. At the top of the page, click Bulk upload users.

5. Download the sample CSV (comma-separated values) template.

6. Open the CSV file in a spreadsheet application, such as Google Sheets or Microsoft® Excel.
The file has columns for the attributes that can appear in each user's profile.



Step 2: Enter users' information


- For each user you want to add, enter information in these columns in the spreadsheet:
- First Name
- Last Name
- Primary email address (Email have to be valid, a confirmation email will be sent with the temporary password).



Step 3: Save the file


After you've filled in the spreadsheet, save it as a CSV file (.csv).

Notes:


- Maximum CSV file size is 3,5 MB.
- Maximum number of records per file is 1,000.
- If your file is larger or has too many records, open it in your spreadsheet program, split the table into separate files, and save each one as a CSV file. Make sure you include the column headings row in all CSV files.
- To upload non-ASCII or double byte usernames, first save the CSV file in UTF-8, including BOM.



Step 4: Upload the file


1. After you've filled in the spreadsheet, save it as a CSV file.

2. At the top of the Users page, click Bulk upload users.

3. Click Attach CSV.

4. Click Upload. If there's an error, enter the missing information in your spreadsheet and upload the file again.
Once processing is complete, a success message appears.



After you add the user


When you’re done, the new users can sign in. The new users receives a welcome email message that explains how to sign in for the first time.

myWearable.description: Wearable

myWearable.section: What is it?
myWearable.description:
HINDSITE is a wearable, cloud based, knowledge management platform, purpose built for enterprise evidentiary capture to enable in-situ micro-learnings.

Make, take, capture and archive handsfree, real-time HD streaming calls from your safety certified smart-glasses to peers, stakeholders or internal Triage Centres.

Reduce expensive travel and ancillary management costs, do more with what you have.

myWearable.section: Login
myWearable.description:
Before you begin


You need the QR code of your User (Check how to Generate QR Code).

1. Talk the name of your organization 'Hindsite'.

2. Talk 'Scan QR Code'.

3. Point the camera to the Generated QR Code of your user.

4. You will see the Main Screen.

myWearable.section: Navigation Help
myWearable.description:
After your login



1. Talk 'Show help'.

2. You will see the list of words to help you navigate your wearable.

myWearable.section: Take Photo
myWearable.description:
After your login



1. Talk 'Take Photo'.

2. Look at the image you would like to take a photo and talk 'Take Photo'.

3. Check if the image is fine for you.

4. If YES and you would like to Save the photo, just talk 'Send'.
The photo will be automatically shared in all your platforms.

5. If you did not like the photo just talk 'Cancel' and it will return to Main Screen.

myWearable.section: Capture Video
myWearable.description:
After your login



1. Talk 'Capture Video'.

2. Talk 'Record Video' to start recording and talk 'Stop Recording' to stop.'.

3. Check if the video is fine for you.

4. If YES and you would like to Save the video, just talk 'Send'.
The video will be automatically shared in all your platforms.

5. If you did not like the video just talk 'Cancel' and it will return to Main Screen.

myWearable.section: Micro Learning
myWearable.description:
After your login



1. Talk 'Micro Learning'.

2. You will see all the photos and videos of your organization.

3. You can navigate talking 'Page Up' or 'Page Down' or 'Page Right' or 'Page Left'.

4. If it is a video, you can talk 'Play Video'.

myWearable.section: Sync Device
myWearable.description:
After your login



1. Talk 'Sync Device'.

2. If there is any file in your device that is not synced yet.
This option will share your files on all platforms.

myWearable.section: Make Call
myWearable.description:
After your login



1. Talk 'Make Call'.

2. Online users will appear first.

You can navigate talking '/b>Next Page' or 'Prev Page'.

3. Just talk the name of the user you would like to call 'User'.

4. To finish the call just talk 'Disconnect Call'.

myWearable.section: Update HINDSITE version
myWearable.description:
After your login



1. Talk 'Go to Settings'.

2. Talk 'Check update'.

If there is a new version, it will show Install now HINDSITE new version.

3. Talk 'Install Now'.

*Please see this video of how to update HINDSITE version on the HMT-1.

myWearable.section: LogOut
myWearable.description:
After your login



1. Talk 'LogOut'.

2. Talk 'Yes'if you are sure you want to Logout.

OR

3. Talk 'Cancel' to go back to Main Screen.

mySupportContact.description: Support contact details

mySupportContact.section: Contact us
mySupportContact.description:
Let's get started!


Would you like to book a demo? YES!

1. Go to (https://www.hindsiteind.com/contact/).

2. Click in 'Contact HINDSITE Today'

3. Please fill the form with: - First Name and Last Name
- Email Address
- Phone Number

4. Click in 'Contact me'

5. We will contact you shortly.

mySupportContact.section: Contact Hindsite Support
mySupportContact.description:
Login in your dashboard.


1. Open your Hindsite dashboard console. (https://admin.hindsiteind.com/).

2. Login with your Email and Password.

3. Go to the top right of your Dashboard and click in the phone icon.

4. HINDSITE Support will show in your list or use the search option.

5. Click in the phone icon on the right of the HINDSITE Support.

6. To finish the call, just close the screen.

myHeader.description: Frequently asked questions

myFooter.description: Processing...
